source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video captures a scenery shot of a spacious and verdant zoo or park. The camera pans across a landscape featuring a combination of wooden boardwalks and wide, paved paths that wind through numerous leafy green trees and planters edged with natural stone. The animal enclosures are integrated into the environment with large, artificial rock formations and simple metal fences. The focus remains on the overall environment and its peaceful atmosphere, as the camera's sweeping movement captures the scale and design of the park rather than singling out any of the few visitors strolling through the area as a primary subject.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt:
The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject. Please concisely specify the type of scenery shot (e.g., a landscape or cityscape scenery shot) in a single fluent paragraph.Also explain why there is no main subject, such as the focus being on the environment, atmosphere, or scale rather than a specific object. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

Please avoid using phrases like "the first frame" or "the last frame" in your description. Instead, refer to the entire sequence simply as "the video." Your description should integrate observations from all frames into a cohesive, temporally and logically consistent narrative, rather than describing frames in isolation. Whenever you mention a subject, be sure to include detailed descriptions of its key visual attributes. The final output should be a single, fluent paragraph describing the video, with no Markdown formatting or introductory text. Don't mention the surroundings or the subject's motion unless necessary to distinguish subjects by location, action, or relationship.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This video captures a scenery shot of a spacious and verdant zoo or park. The camera pans across a landscape featuring a combination of wooden boardwalks and wide, paved paths that wind through numerous leafy green trees and planters edged with natural stone. The animal enclosures are integrated into the environment with large, artificial rock formations and simple metal fences. The focus remains on the overall environment and its peaceful atmosphere, as the camera's sweeping movement captures the scale and design of the park rather than singling out any of the few visitors strolling through the area as a primary subject.

generated_critique: While the caption correctly identifies the video as a scenery shot of a zoo and accurately describes the general infrastructure like the wooden boardwalks and paved paths, it misses several key visual details. Most significantly, it fails to mention the animals visible within the enclosures. For instance, in the large rock enclosure, two giraffes can be seen in the midground, one standing still while the other lowers its head toward a water source. The description of the "few visitors" is also too generic; a more specific detail, such as noting the presence of a family with a person pushing a blue stroller along the far path, would add useful context without making them the primary subject. Furthermore, the phrase "peaceful atmosphere" is a subjective interpretation and should be replaced with objective observations. The description of the enclosures could also be more precise by noting that the "simple metal fences" are specifically black, vertical bars and that a shallow, water-filled moat separates the main viewing path from the artificial rock formations.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This video captures a scenic view of a spacious and verdant zoo or park. The camera pans across a landscape featuring wooden boardwalks and wide, paved paths winding through numerous leafy green trees and planters edged with natural stone. The animal enclosures are integrated into the environment with large, artificial rock formations and black, vertical metal fences, separated from the main viewing path by a shallow, water-filled moat. In the midground, two giraffes are visible within a large rock enclosureâ€”one standing still while the other lowers its head toward a water source. A family with a person pushing a blue stroller can be seen along the far path, adding a touch of human presence without dominating the scene. The focus remains on the overall environment and its design, as the camera's sweeping movement captures the scale and layout of the park.
